text: graduated 2023, the school was fine but some p6s are very badly disciplined, do not learn anything even after punishments. overall the education system is alright as some of my classmates went to prestigious schools. canteen food is alright

CCKPS is a very good school and it impressed me. Initially, we selected this school thinking it was just a common school, but we didn’t expect the quality of the teachers to be so good. The students' academic performance and environment are good too. My son has really benefited from this school, and he still doesn’t need tuition services for now.
Cckps I would recommend, there's really great people and funny teachers, 5/5.

hello, im a former student of cckps. I graduated last year and already miss it ☹️ If you are looking for a suitable primary school for your child, I'd like to recommend this school. the facilities are good, students are friendly and you can always confide in the teachers.

It’s a good school in cck! My child was transferred to this school early this year. The teachers are good and really care on the children. The school has good facilities and many cca selection. Highly recommend!
